meanings.definition: The act of making something into a routine.
meanings.sent1: The routinization of his morning exercise helped him stay healthy.
meanings.sent2: She found comfort in the routinization of her daily tasks.
meanings.sent3: The routinization of feeding the cat became a daily comedy routine.
meanings.sent4: The routinization of her work life turned her into a robot.
meanings.sent5: The routinization of the factory assembly line made production efficient.

meanings.definition: The process of establishing a routine.
meanings.sent1: The routinization of his study habits improved his grades.
meanings.sent2: She understood the importance of routinization in her training.
meanings.sent3: The routinization of grocery shopping turned into a fun game.
meanings.sent4: The routinization of her morning ritual was like clockwork.
meanings.sent5: The routinization of the team's warm-up routine made them perform better.
